name: container_exploitation
description: Docker and Kubernetes container exploitation and escape

expected_output.example:
CONTAINER ID   IMAGE          STATUS      PORTS

Container running with exposed ports

uid=0(root) gid=0(root) groups=0(root)

Root access inside container
